Question
========
(3) Diketahui P(A) = 0.6, P(B) = 0.5, dan P(A ∪ B) = 0.8.
a) Hitung P(A ∩ B)
b) Hitung P(A|B)
c) Apakah A dan B independen? Buktikan!

Solution
========
a) P(A ∩ B):
P(A ∪ B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A ∩ B)
0.8 = 0.6 + 0.5 - P(A ∩ B)
P(A ∩ B) = 0.3

b) P(A|B) = P(A ∩ B) / P(B) = 0.3 / 0.5 = 0.6

c) Independen:
P(A) × P(B) = 0.6 × 0.5 = 0.3
P(A ∩ B) = 0.3
Karena sama, maka A dan B INDEPENDEN.
